website_summaries.verdict: Super cute dress for girls from 2T up to big girl 20.
pros: Asymmetrical hemline is fun for girls to wear
Comes in so many sizes you can fit several ages of kids in the same dress
cons: The fit on this dress is a little small

customer_reviews.title: The back is lace.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. My daughter got good use out of this dress. She wore it for 2 school events, where she sang the National Anthem. The material has a little stretch to it. The back is just criss-crossed lace. She wore a camisole underneath and it was fine. She us just under 5', and 115lbs, and wears a 14/16, and this dress fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Patriotic and cute!
customer_reviews.text: The dress looked very cute for the school program. We ordered a size 8, daughter is 7 and weighs around 65 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: SarahR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fourth of July
customer_reviews.text: We always take a photo on the 4th of July and so I like to make sure we are all wearing something patriotic. This dress is adorable, comfortable, and photographed very well. I have washed it twice now and I noticed that the colors are starting to fade a bit, so I will probably put it away until next July and not let her wear it for everyday play.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Cute dress!
customer_reviews.text: Cute dress. Fit was just a little smaller than most size 12 dresses, worked out fine for us! Looks like picture. Worked perfect for what we needed. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Long and lean fit- washable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dress for July 4th! Washed on gentle cycle and hang dry- bought a St 7 for my 7.5 yr old - she is tall and slim and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: CO Mom

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely adorable dress!! My daughter gets many comments on how cute it is. It is slightly tight so I’d suggest a size up but it does have a decent amount of stretch to it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: The dress was absolutely adorable and my daughter loved it. We got compliments on it every where we went.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little dress!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, embroidery on the front. With purchase from this company/brand again. Bought this for my niece, it fits, but I don’t have measurements to add to this review. She is 4 1/2 and I bought her the size 5.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni Linse

customer_reviews.title: Love Bonnie Jean but not this one.
customer_reviews.text: Im a big fan of Bonnie Jean dresses and have always been pleased with the quality and value but this dress didn't do it for me. The dress looks like the picture but it was way to small .
customer_reviews.author: BCoughlin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the nice, stretchy, comfortable fabric. You can't tell from the picture, but the left shoulder strap is actually made of three ribbons--red, white, and blue which gives the dress a fancy feel. She can't wait to wear it on the 4th of July!
customer_reviews.author: survivormom2

customer_reviews.title: Made for taller than average girls.
customer_reviews.text: This dress is made a taller than average size child. Cute dress and cool material. My granddaughter has not worn it at all
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. Ybanez

customer_reviews.title: Cute dress for Fourth of July
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! It is spandex so it is snug to the body. If your little girl doesn’t like that type of fit then this one is not for her. It stays in place as she plays which is good. Doesn’t ride up.
customer_reviews.author: Woods

customer_reviews.title: Nice dress
customer_reviews.text: It fits a tad small, we bought it just for one day but if you want it all summer I would go one size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Hink1978

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! I bought matching dresses for my daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I bought matching dresses for my daughters - they loved the dress!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Roche

customer_reviews.title: Great dress!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter an she loved it! Fits great and the color is wonderful! Very cute 4th of July dress!
customer_reviews.author: Cs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect patriotic dress
customer_reviews.text: It was very cute and perfect for the 4th of july !my daughter got many compliments wearing it. I loved the back and how it was lace and showed a little of my daughter's back.
customer_reviews.author: britanny nichols

customer_reviews.title: Dress is nice and quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Dress is nice and quality is good. BUT it runs very small!! If your kid is a petite size 6 then you should purchase a size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Great dress & worth every penny👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this dress. It was made very well & really cute. My granddaughter loved it💗
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Heredia

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old, she picked it out. She loves it! So cute 😁
customer_reviews.author: ginger carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this dress
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and the back is really cool too, good material, great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Arttus

customer_reviews.title: Love the dress
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter going to wear it to her brothers graduation party
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C. Schrowang

customer_reviews.title: Little sparkler
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old looked and felt so pretty. Super 4th outfit for your special little lady.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this dress. She wears it whenever she can.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Colors vibrant and fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Colors vibrant and fit as expected! My daughter loves it and worked great for 4th of July party!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves this dress. I got it for her for a Veteran's application assembly with her Grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bay

product_meta.title: Bonnie Jean Big Girls Red White Blue Americana 4th July Dress
